"The Weapon Palette":
"You can add a combination of weapons and photon arts/techniques to the weapon palette to switch equipment easily.

Move palette up: <%PaletteReverse>
Move palette down: <%PaletteForce>"
"Hey, you wanna join me on this? It would really help me out if you came along."
"I may be an ARKS member now, but I'm still on the bottom rung of the ladder."
"It's not like I'm itching to fight, but we should really master all the techniques we can, so we'll be ready when it counts."
"Anyway, it's time to get started. Switching between weapons is about as basic as it gets."
"I know, they taught us this before. I just hope I can remember how it goes."
